Key Match Events: Brendan Donovan hit a three-run homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: It was the first victory for St. Louis in the Bronx since Tim McCarver hit a three-run homer in the 10th inning in Game 5 of the 1964 World Series
Others: St. Louis improved to 1-7 at Yankee Stadium in the regular season
Iván Herrera hit an RBI double
Kyle Gibson pitched seven strong innings
Andrew Kittredge gave up pinch-hitter Giancarlo Stanton’s three-run double
Ryan Helsley worked a shaky ninth for his 42nd save in 45 chances
